t: Amazon.com: Where The Light Shines Through [2 LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Out of the 15 songs on the Deluxe Edition, I kept 12, 10 from the standard and two from the deluxe. Jon's brand of uplifting lyricism with spiritual overtones matches the album's music well. What separates Switchfoot from many Pop Rock outfits is the use of thoughtful, fun, and challenging lyrics.
